companies.name: Fulltech LTDA
companies.companyDescription: Fulltech is a Fintech focused on the development and application of financial solutions for companies and entrepreneurs.
companies.roleDescription: As a Fullstack Developer at Fulltech, I am responsible to build solutions looking for performance, responsive websites, design principles, and patterns. I also worked writing tests using xUnit for unit tests and Cypress for E2E tests.
